snippet: Five former ambassadors to the Holy See endorsed Mitt Romney on Saturday, choosing a Mormon over two Catholic rivals in the race for the Republican presidential nomination.
abstract: Five former ambassadors to the Holy See endorsed Mitt Romney on Saturday, choosing a Mormon over two Catholic rivals in the race for the Republican presidential nomination.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- Five former ambassadors to the Vatican endorsed Mitt Romney on Saturday, choosing a Mormon over two Roman Catholic rivals in the race for the Republican presidential nomination.

headline.main: Romney Showcases Endorsement by Ex-Ambassadors to Vatican
